message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think it's a great deal and will be very useful for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $100?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I can go down to $105, but that's my best price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
